page.title: 16PUBLIC AMENITIES
page.content: 1){Local Shop}-there is only one shop in the block,it is in Portnahaven and could be classed as a General Store. 2){Post Office}-situated in Portnahaven. Postal Rates:Letter Post-1st.class 17p 2nd.class 13p.Parcel Post 1kg. Â£1.33 5kg. Â£2.50. Collection/Delivery:there are two collection times 6.30a.m. and 11.30a.m Delivery is once per day and starts at approx.2.00p.m. 3){Village Hall}-see Rhinns Hall page 14. 4){Hotel}-there is one small licensed in Portnahaven.This hotel has been owned and run by the same family for at least 3 generations. 5){Mobile Library}-calls at block once per week. 6){Mobile Bank}-calls once per week, essential service bank is 20mls away.
